channel.title: Digital Nomad Fake Zen Prefix
channel.description: Building a tech company from scratch isnâ€™t easy. But, Josh Nielsen, the founder of the popular podcast recording platform Zencastr, made it happen. And there were many life lessons learned along the way. This is the true story of how Zencastr was built.
channel.itunes:author: zenessamicison

item.title: 03: Coding Competitions, Starting a Business and Podcasters
item.itunes:title: 03: Coding Competitions, Starting a Business and Podcasters
item.description:
Josh and some friends hack javascript by entering the Node Knockout competition. Together, they launch their first business, Soundkeep, a collaborative tool for musicians. And Josh learns how podcasters can benefit from his new project.

Play the games Josh and his friends created at Node Knockout! Paste the link into your browser. 8 Bit Beats: http://167.71.145.90:7777 Disasteroids: http://167.71.145.90:8087

item.title: 02: First Job, New Friends and Entrepreneurship
item.itunes:title: 02: First Job, New Friends and Entrepreneurship
item.description: Josh really puts himself on the line (literally) when he calls in to a podcast to win over his future boss. He moves to LA and meets Adrian Lopez who later becomes Zencastr's chief product officer. And then... Josh gets bitten by the start-up bug.
item.content:encoded: Josh really puts himself on the line (literally) when he calls in to a podcast to win over his future boss. He moves to LA and meets Adrian Lopez who later becomes Zencastr's chief product officer. And then... Josh gets bitten by the start-up bug.

item.title: 01: Growing Up, Faith and Getting Engaged
item.itunes:title: 01: Growing Up, Faith and Getting Engaged
item.description: The story of Zencastr starts with Josh Nielsen, a boy growing up in Denton, Texas. You'll learn more about his childhood, his personality and how he found the love of his life. All before he even had the idea to create the product now known as Zencastr.
